title: Dodo
subtitle: Privacy-focused bill splitting
name: Name
want_make_admin: Do you want to make them an admin?
login_required: You need to log in again!
want_delete: Do you want to revoke the item?
members_explanation: See the members of the group and modify your nickname
rename_group_explanation: If you don't like the name
history_explanation: Follow, modify and revoke recent transactions
want_edit: Do you want to modify the item?
discovery_add_floating_description:
Purchase:
Enter the amount, if you bought something for one or more members, the then app distributes it evenly between them.

Payment:
Enter an amount if you payed a member.
discovery_drawer_description:
At the top of the menu you can switch between your groups.

Below you can find your personal settings.
discovery_settings_description: Here you can change your username or password, and choose between beautiful color themes. üòâ
discover_shopping_description:
Everyone in the group has access to this shopping list

You can use it travelling together or when sharing a flat.
discover_group_settings_description: Amongst other things this menu is used to invite people to the group and to change your nickname.
reset_tutorial_explanation: You'll need to restart the app
cannot_connect: Connecting to the server was unsuccessful. Check your internet connection and try again.
format_exception: An error occurred while parsing the data. Please try again.
balance_at_least_0: Your balance needs to be at least 0 to leave the group!
really_kick: If you kick this member, their current balance will be added to your balance. Are you sure you want to kick them?
really_leave: If you leave, your current balance will be split between everyone else. Are you sure you want to leave?
change_username_explanation: Change the username which you use to log in to the app
change_password_explanation: Change the password which you use to log in to the app
change_group_currency_explanation: Change the currency of the group, but note that the balances will not be converted!
sure_merge_guest: Are you sure you want to assign the guest to the chosen member?
about_us_explanation: Informations about us and the app
about_us_text:
Two guys bored and making apps like this.

Shout out to Anna Hegyi, √Åbel Kocsis and S√°ra Kata Kov√°cs, and to everyone testing our app.

Take care, your devs
username_explanation: You're going to use the username for logging into the app. Only the english lowecase letters and numbers are allowed. Later you will be able to assign yourself a nickname for each group.
reminder_explanation: We aren't storing you e-mail, so if you forget your password, we will show you this reminder.
must_accept_privacy_policy: You have to accept the privacy policy!
gradient_available_in_paid_version: You can buy the gradient and dynamic themes through the app
version_not_supported_explanation: We updated Lender to a new version. With this change some of the features in your versions will not work.
remove_ads_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in its full reality.
Remove the ads.
group_boost_explanation:
Boost the group member limit to 30 and unlock its statistics.
The bundle contains Dodos enough for 2 groups.
ad_gradient_bundle_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in its full beauty.
Remove ads, unlock gradient and dynamic themes.
gradients_explanation:
Enjoy Lender in all of its colors.
Unlock the gradient and dynamic themes. (Our favorite is the orange one üòâ)
big_lender_bundle_explanation: This is the small Lender bundle, but we added group-boosting Dodos enough for 1 group.
boost_group_explanation: Increase the group member limit to 30 and keep track of the statistics.
sure_boost: Are you sure you want to boost the group?
already_boosted: This group has already been boosted!
delete_all_data_explanation: Using this there won't be any remaining data on our servers, which could be bond to you
add_guests_offline: Or add offline guests to the group
you_seem_lonely_explanation: You will be able to do these in the group settings
sure_user_delete: You won't be able to restore your account! Do you want to continue?
group_stats_explanation: Below are all the payments and purchases of the group
select_date_explanation: Pick the range in which you want to see the statistics
personalised_ads: I want to see personalised ads
statistics_not_available_explanation: This group is not boosted, so the statistics aren't available. Boost the group or buy Groupboosting Dodos in the store!
use_personalised_ads_explanation: If you want to see personalised ads
trial_version_explanation: You registered in the past two weeks, so you are using the app with certain bonuses. These include the ad-free experience, the usage of two-tone, gradient and dynamic themes and the access to group statistics. After two weeks you can buy these in the Dodo Store if you want.
calculator_explanation: A simple calculator if you need it üòâ
approve_members_explanation: Approve joining of new members to the group. You can toggle the necessity of the admin approval below.
download_xls_explanation: Use this if you want to manage the data for yourself
download_pdf_explanation: Use this if you want to get a quick overview of the group
export_explanation: The groups data as XLS or PDF
cannot_modify_element_deleted_member: You cannot modify the element, as it contains a removed member
cannot_delete_element_deleted_member: You cannot revoke the element, as it contains a removed member
modify_payment_explanation: Modify a payment if its details changed
modify_purchase_explanation: Modify a purchase if its details changed
not_in_group: You are not a member of this group!
approve_still_needed: The request to join the group was sent, it needs to be approved by the group's admins. Be patient, you will be receiving a notification.
im_shopping_explanation: Your friends will be notified, that you are shopping
group_needs_approval_explanation: Decide whether it needs an admin's approval to join the group
boost_group_boosted_explanation: This group has already been boosted 😎. This means, that you are able to see the group's statistics and that the member limit is up to 30.
share_url: Or invite your friends with a message
dynamic_themes_explanation: These themes will dynamically change when you change your system color preference (if available)
iapp_not_supported: The store is not enabled on your platform
iapp_not_supported_explanation:
In app items (ex. no ads, color themes) can as of right now only be purchased in the Android app.
If you don't own an Android device but still want to buy something please write an email to developer@lenderapp.net.
no_camera_access: The app has no prmission to access the camera.
custom_amount_hint: Hint: Long press on a member below to customize the amount they paid.
add_purchase_explanation: By default the amount will be split equally between the selected members.
cant_add_custom_amount_toast: The amount to be paid can't be customized.
no_money_left_toast: You've already distributed the whole amount.
custom_above_amount_toast: Them whole amount was below the custom value set earlier.
sum_above_amount_toast: The sum of the custom values was above the full amount.
custom_amount_explanation: Set how much the chosen member should pay.
change_user_currency_explanation: This is your default currency, the one in which the summary is shown.
char_not_allowed: You are not allowed to use the ‚Äû{}‚Äú character
username_taken: The chosen username is already taken.
password_login_deprecated: The preferred login method is the pin
password_login_deprecated_explanation: Switch to using pin after login under the user settings menu.
member_to_merge_into: Who to assign their transactions to:
warning_wont_see: Since you did not buy and you are not paying, you will not see the transaction in your history!
even_one_rating_helps: We're really glad you like the app. Please review it in store😊. Every review helps to get more people to find it!
merge_with_guest_explanation:
The group has guest user(s) whose transactions have been handled by other members. If you recognise yourself as one of them, you can now associate their previous transactions with you.
(If you don't know what this means, skip this step.)
